sentences.en: Crimson, Chrysanthemum - flowered ; upright stems and stalks , stout branches , elliptical leaves, middle blossoming.
sentences.cn: 菊花型, 红色.颈直.柄直.叶椭圆.株形半开展, 枝条粗壮.分枝能力中. 花中期.

sentences.en: Elliptical sentences are frequently seen in English, especially in some particular situations.
sentences.cn: 英语中省略句出现的频率甚高, 且以特定语境下的省略见多.

sentences.en: He loved elliptical comments capable of many interpretations.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢发表含蓄的,可作多种解释的谈话.

sentences.en: His random , elliptical, occasionally emotional manner of conversation was bound to shock, and mislead, the historians.
sentences.cn: 他谈话时漫无边际, 藏头掩尾, 间或感情冲动的特点,必定会使历史学家们感到吃惊和引起他们的误解.

sentences.en: Hot forming of stainless steel elliptical head is specifical process.
sentences.cn: 对不锈钢椭圆封头,其压制工艺过程特殊.

sentences.en: Its sleek elliptical shape is well - defined in both the tank and seat.
sentences.cn: 水箱和坐便器底座呈现浑圆的椭圆形状,甚至冲水把手也显得动感十足.

sentences.en: Kepler published his discovery of the elliptical orbits of planets in 1609. 1609
sentences.cn: 年开普勒公布他的发现，认为行星轨道为椭圆形。

sentences.en: Keywords: circular Couette flow, Taylor vortex, fluid instability, elliptical inner cylinder.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 圆形库页特流 、 泰勒涡漩 、 流体不稳定 、 椭圆形内柱.

sentences.en: Laser diode emits the elliptical divergent Gauss beam depended on temperature.
sentences.cn: 半导体激光器发出的是一束发散的椭园形高斯光束,并具有温度依赖性.

sentences.en: Light green, elliptical, very thin, long flexible petiole. Usually single crown. Large.
sentences.cn: 亮绿色椭圆型很薄的叶子, 长而有弹性的叶柄. 通常单个顶芽. 大型.

sentences.en: Reason 3 : The elliptical shape reminds you of Easter Eggs.
sentences.cn: 理由 3: 椭圆的形状会使你想起复活节的彩蛋.

sentences.en: The language is often elliptical and ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 语言经常是隐晦和模棱两可的。

sentences.en: The stadium is elliptical in plan.
sentences.cn: 在设计图上，体育场呈椭圆形。

sentences.en: To avoid shock to the knees the elliptical machine was designed.
sentences.cn: 设计椭圆健身机是为了避免膝盖受到踔伤.

sentences.en: VOICE : What's wrong with an elliptical orbit for those planets?
sentences.cn: 那些行星的轨道是椭圆有什么问题 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yet there is also some elliptical motion to this general trend.
sentences.cn: 可是,在总体趋势上仍然有一些椭圆形的运动.

phrases.tran_cn: 卫星椭圆轨道；椭圆轨迹

trans.tran_cn: 椭圆的，像椭圆形的，省略的
trans.tran_en: having the shape of an ellipse
